items.title: Should you invest in Hansa Investment Company?
items.description: William Salomon has finally brought the two trusts he controls together. Should investors buy in?

items.title: Is Britain heading for a big debt crisis?
items.description: Things are not yet as bad as some reports have claimed. But they sure aren’t rosy either, says Julian Jessop

items.title: Bitcoin 'has become the reserve asset of the internet'
items.description: The cryptocurrency has established itself as the electronic version of gold, says ByteTree’s Charlie Morris

items.title: 'Labour’s failure on house building is turning into a national emergency'
items.description: Labour’s plans on house building are not working out and it's not hard to work out what has gone wrong, says Matthew Lynn

items.title: Simple assessment explained as millions brace for unexpected tax bills
items.description: Increasing numbers of people could get letters from HMRC saying they owe more tax due to frozen thresholds, under a system known as simple assessment....
